english: We need to activate our crisis management plan.
arabic: نحتاج إلى تفعيل خطة إدارة أزمتنا.

english: The situation is critical.
We need to assess the damage.
We need to communicate effectively with our stakeholders.
arabic: نحتاج إلى التواصل بشكل فعال مع أصحاب المصلحة لدينا.

english: We need to develop a contingency plan.
We need to prioritize our actions.
We need to remain calm and collected.
We need to learn from this experience.
arabic: نحتاج إلى التعلم من هذه التجربة.

english: We need to conduct a post-crisis review.
arabic: نحتاج إلى إجراء مراجعة لما بعد الأزمة.

english: We need to provide support to our employees.
We need to protect our reputation.
We need to minimize the impact of the crisis.
We need to identify the root cause of the problem.
arabic: نحتاج إلى تحديد السبب الجذري للمشكلة.

english: We need to implement corrective actions.
We need to build a resilient organization.
We need to focus on crisis prevention.
arabic: نحتاج إلى التركيز على منع الأزمات.

english: We need to have a crisis communication plan.
We need to establish a crisis management team.
arabic: نحتاج إلى إنشاء فريق إدارة أزمات.

english: We need to have a crisis response plan.
We need to conduct regular crisis drills.
arabic: نحتاج إلى إجراء تدريبات أزمات منتظمة.
